text:
@senatemajldr Let me remind you again Democrats passed the bill over . 2 months . You refused to put more money for Covid relief ....Billionaires are getting richer while middle and poor American family are suffering 😡https://t.co/9WtCu9HMEL
Can’t wait for you to be voted out 😡@AmyMcGrathKY
